Package sophiabcrypt

Class SbcEncEngine

java.lang.Object
sophiabcrypt.SbcEncEngine
public class SbcEncEngine
extends Object
This a main engine class of SophiaBCrypt. It's used for start process encrypt and decrypt files
Since:
Oct/2018
Author:
CesarBianchi
See Also:
SbcEncryptor, Cipher

    • GoCryptM

      public void GoCryptM​(String cPsw) throws Exception
      Load all full path files for Encrpyt and call Encrypt method
      Parameters:
      cPsw - user defined password for encrypt file
      Throws:
      Exception - Cause List of Files is null or zero
      Since:
      Oct/2018

    • GoCrypt

      public void GoCrypt​(String cPsw, String cPath) throws Exception
      Read a binary file, create a new encrypt filename, call encrypt class, save new file and erase a primal file
      Parameters:
      cPsw - user defined password for encrypt file
      cPath - full path of primal file
      Throws:
      Exception - Cause file read or file create be error
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • GoDecrypt

      public void GoDecrypt​(String cPsw, String cPath) throws Exception
      Read a encrypted file, create a new decrypt filename, call decrypt class, save new file and erase a encrypted file
      Parameters:
      cPsw - user defined password for decrypt file
      cPath - full path of encrypted file
      Throws:
      Exception - Cause file read or file create be error
      Since:
      Sep/2018

    • GetNewName

      private String GetNewName​(String cPath, String cOper)
      This method return a new encrypted or decrypted filename based on input param
      Parameters:
      cPath - full path of based file
      cOper - The type of operation: ENC equals Encrpyted file name return or DEC equals DECRYPTED file name return
      Returns:
      cReturn The new file name at String type format
      Since:
      Sep/2018

      private boolean EraseFile​(String cPath)
      This method erase a specific file using a security recursive trying
      Parameters:
      cPath - String of full path of file to be erased
      Returns:
      excluiu The result of attempting to delete the operation (in a boolean type format)
      Since:
      Sep/2018

      public void setOper​(String cOp)

      Parameters:
      cOp - String of type operation. ENC equals "Encrypt" and DEC equals "Decrypt"

      Sep/2018
